definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: Even in time of danger, many times in body armor.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在危险时刻，多次以身相护。

sentences.english: Also write down the time of day and the time of year.
sentences.chinese: 也不要忘了记下年月日和时刻。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: We have held these meetings at an important time.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一个重要时刻召开这次会议。

sentences.english: It's good we checked the time of the train.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我们核查了火车时刻。

sentences.english: But for now, a symbolic moment is about to occur.
sentences.chinese: 但在眼下，一个象征性的时刻即将出现。

sentences.english: All sounds are still only moments, the mood will be cheerful jump.
sentences.chinese: 只有万籁俱静的时刻，心绪才会欢快的跳跃。

sentences.english: At what point does the RO decide to abandon in deteriorating weather conditions?
sentences.chinese: 天气恶化时，裁判长在什么时刻决定放弃竞赛？

sentences.english: Keep in mind that Drone Platforms don't supply Assimilators when sold.
sentences.chinese: 时刻记得机械平台在卖掉得时候不提供同化者。

sentences.english: My favorite is probably the bullet-time rig used in The Matrix.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的可能是黑客帝国中的子弹时刻了。

sentences.english: On other occasions I threatened to pulverize it.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的时刻，我扬言要粉碎它。

sentences.english: All companies find themselves retrenching at some point.
sentences.chinese: 所有的公司都会在某个时刻发现他们正在收缩。

sentences.english: I enjoy cuddling with my love one and interment moments.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢拥抱我的爱一个人和安葬的时刻。

sentences.english: This is the hour of an ablution heart.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个洗礼心灵的时刻。

definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to pass/to spend (time)/to survive/to get through
